meta.description: Defines available consensus mechanisms, their resource requirements, and tier availability.

gossip.name: Gossip Protocol
gossip.description: Epidemic broadcast for efficient information dissemination.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Epidemic Theory / Percolation Theory on Graphs
blueprint.mechanism: Randomized peer selection (fanout f) + push/pull state exchange
blueprint.fault_detection: Message entropy variance > threshold or peer unreachability > timeout
blueprint.complexity_details: O(log N) convergence time, O(N) total messages

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Partial Ordering of Events (Causal History)
blueprint.mechanism: Increment local counter on event; Merge remote vectors via element-wise max()
blueprint.fault_detection: Causality violation detected via timestamp inversion or concurrent modification conflicts
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N) size per message where N is number of actors

crdt.name: CRDT
crdt.description: Conflict-free Replicated Data Types for automatic merge.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Join-Semilattices (Monotonicity)
blueprint.mechanism: Commutative, Associative, Idempotent merge operations ensuring convergence
blueprint.fault_detection: State divergence detected via Merkle sync or checksum mismatch
blueprint.complexity_details: O(1) merge complexity (dependent on data structure size)

merkle_tree.name: Merkle Tree
merkle_tree.description: Cryptographic hash tree for efficient verification.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Cryptographic Hash Trees (Collision-Resistant Hash Functions)
blueprint.fault_detection: Root hash mismatch implies data corruption in leaf or branch
blueprint.complexity_details: O(log N) verification, O(N) build

simple_bft.name: Simple BFT
simple_bft.description: Simplified BFT for safety-critical robotics and prototyping.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Byzantine Generals Problem (f < n/3)
blueprint.mechanism: Signed message exchange with 2/3 majority voting
blueprint.fault_detection: Conflicting signatures or equivocation detected via signature verification
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N^2) message complexity

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Set Intersection Property (Majority)
blueprint.mechanism: Read/Write quorums satisfying R + W > N
blueprint.fault_detection: Quorum unavailability or split-brain conditions
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N) message complexity

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Replicated State Machine Safety (Log Matching Property)
blueprint.mechanism: Strong Leader Election + Log Replication + Commit Index advancement
blueprint.fault_detection: Term mismatch, Log inconsistency (prevLogIndex/Term mismatch), Heartbeat timeout
blueprint.complexity_details: O(1) normal op, O(N) election

paxos.name: Paxos
paxos.description: Robust consensus algorithm with strong guarantees.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Consensus on a Value (Synod Protocol)
blueprint.fault_detection: Livelock (dueling proposers) or Proposal rejection
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N) messages per round

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Game Theory (Nash Equilibrium) & Cryptoeconomics
blueprint.mechanism: Validator selection weighted by stake; Slashing conditions for misbehavior
blueprint.fault_detection: Double signing or Nothing-at-stake detected via slashing proofs
blueprint.complexity_details: O(1) selection (VRF), O(N) validation

bft.name: Byzantine Fault Tolerant
bft.description: Full Byzantine protection for adversarial environments.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Interactive Consistency
blueprint.fault_detection: Byzantine behavior (equivocation) detected via quorum certificates
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N^2) message complexity

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: BFT State Machine Replication (Locking rules)
blueprint.fault_detection: Double signing or Lock violation detected via evidence submission
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N) with gossip layer

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Pipelined BFT (Linear View Change)
blueprint.mechanism: Three-chain commit rule with rotating leader and threshold signatures
blueprint.fault_detection: Safety violation (QC mismatch) or Liveness failure (View timeout)
blueprint.complexity_details: O(N) authenticator complexity

geometric_consensus.name: Geometric Consensus
geometric_consensus.description: Full geometric synchronization with manifold operations.

tangent_space_gossip.name: Tangent Space Gossip
tangent_space_gossip.description: Projects neighbors to local Tangent Space for linear averaging.

hyperbolic_tree_aggregation.name: Hyperbolic Tree Aggregation
hyperbolic_tree_aggregation.description: Embeds consensus tree in Hyperbolic Metric for fast aggregation.

discrete_ricci_flow.name: Discrete Ricci Flow
discrete_ricci_flow.description: Topology optimization using curvature to detect bottlenecks.

symplectic_geometry.name: Symplectic Geometry Consensus
symplectic_geometry.description: Consensus preserving symplectic structure for physics-based systems.

geometric_median.name: Geometric Median Consensus
geometric_median.description: Robust aggregation minimizing sum of distances (Weiszfeld algorithm).

discrete_exterior_calculus.name: Discrete Exterior Calculus Consensus
discrete_exterior_calculus.description: Consensus on discrete differential forms over meshes.

geometric_deep_learning.name: Geometric Deep Learning Consensus
geometric_deep_learning.description: Adaptive consensus using graph neural networks.

spectral_geometry.name: Spectral Geometry Consensus
spectral_geometry.description: Network topology consensus using Laplacian eigenvalues.

optimal_transport.name: Optimal Transport Consensus
optimal_transport.description: Probabilistic consensus using Wasserstein distance (Entropic Reg).

kahler_geometry.name: Kähler Geometry Consensus
kahler_geometry.description: Consensus on complex manifolds with compatible symplectic structure.

spin_geometry.name: Spin Geometry Consensus
spin_geometry.description: Consensus using spinor fields and Clifford algebra.

horosphere_bft.name: Horosphere BFT
horosphere_bft.description: Consensus propagates along horospheres; Byzantine faults create horospherical singularities.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Horospheres in H^n (equidistant surfaces from ideal points at infinity)
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus propagates along horospheres, Byzantine faults create 'horospherical singularities'
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating horospherical equidistance are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for hyperbolic distance computation, O(n) for horosphere validation

ideal_boundary_bft.name: Ideal Boundary BFT
ideal_boundary_bft.description: Consensus states live on ideal boundary; geodesic convergence guarantees agreement.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: ∂H^n (boundary at infinity of hyperbolic space)
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus states live on ideal boundary, geodesic convergence guarantees agreement
blueprint.fault_detection: Byzantine nodes create 'non-convergent' geodesics to boundary
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for boundary points, O(n log n) for geodesic validation

poincare_disk_bft.name: Poincaré Disk BFT
poincare_disk_bft.description: Consensus via Möbius transformations on the unit disk.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Möbius transformations preserving the unit disk
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus operations as Möbius transformations, Byzantine detection via transformation group properties
blueprint.fault_detection: Transformations not preserving the disk indicate Byzantine behavior
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for Möbius operations, O(n log n) for disk preservation

null_geodesic_bft.name: Null Geodesic BFT
null_geodesic_bft.description: Consensus propagates along null geodesics; faults create light cone singularities.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Light-like geodesics in spacetime
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus propagates along null geodesics, Byzantine faults create 'light cone singularities'
blueprint.fault_detection: Messages violating null geodesic constraints are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for null geodesic computation, O(n) for constraint validation

spherical_bft.name: Spherical BFT
spherical_bft.description: Consensus paths follow great circles; antipodal states indicate faults.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Great circles as geodesics on S^n
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus paths follow great circles, Byzantine nodes create 'antipodal singularities'
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes proposing antipodal states (maximally separated) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for spherical distances, O(n log n) for great circle validation

stereographic_bft.name: Stereographic Projection BFT
stereographic_bft.description: Project consensus to plane for computation; validate on sphere.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Conformal mapping between sphere and plane
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Project consensus to plane for computation, validate on sphere
blueprint.fault_detection: Projections creating 'poles' (projection singularities) indicate Byzantine behavior
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for projection, O(n log n) for conformal validation

building_geometry_bft.name: Building Geometry BFT
building_geometry_bft.description: Consensus in apartment systems of affine buildings.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Affine buildings as discrete analogues of symmetric spaces
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in apartment systems, Byzantine faults create 'non-convex' chambers
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating building axioms (apartment systems) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for building distance, O(n) for apartment validation

randers_metric_bft.name: Randers Metric BFT
randers_metric_bft.description: Consensus with 'wind' effects (beta field); faults create metric singularities.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: F(x,v) = √(g_ij v^i v^j) + β_i v^i where β is a 1-form
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus with 'wind' effects (β field), Byzantine nodes create metric singularities
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes creating 'headwind' preventing consensus are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for Randers metric, O(n log n) for β-field validation

liouville_theorem_bft.name: Liouville's Theorem BFT
liouville_theorem_bft.description: Consensus via conformal mappings; rigidity theorem provides fault detection.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Conformal maps in dimension ≥ 3 are Möbius transformations
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus via conformal mappings, rigidity theorem provides Byzantine detection
blueprint.fault_detection: Non-Möbius conformal transformations indicate Byzantine behavior
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n) for conformal factors, O(n log n) for Liouville validation

hyperbolic_random_graph_bft.name: Hyperbolic Random Graph BFT
hyperbolic_random_graph_bft.description: Consensus in tree-like graph structures; faults violate delta-hyperbolicity.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Random graphs with hyperbolic geometry (Gromov hyperbolicity)
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in tree-like graph structures, Byzantine nodes violate δ-hyperbolicity
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes creating 'non-hyperbolic' triangles are Byzantine
blueprint.network_profile: O(n log n) for hyperbolic embedding
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for hyperbolicity testing, O(n) for tree approximation

gromov_boundary_bft.name: Gromov Boundary BFT
gromov_boundary_bft.description: Consensus converges to boundary points of delta-hyperbolic spaces.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Asymptotic boundary of δ-hyperbolic spaces
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus converges to boundary points, Byzantine nodes prevent convergence
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes creating 'divergent' sequences are Byzantine
blueprint.network_profile: O(n log n) for boundary points
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n log n) for boundary convergence, O(n) for asymptotic validation

causal_structure_bft.name: Causal Structure BFT
causal_structure_bft.description: Consensus must respect causal structure; faults violate causality.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Causal relations in Lorentzian manifolds (J+, J- future/past light cones)
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus must respect causal structure, Byzantine nodes violate causality
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes proposing acausal states are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^2) for causal structure validation, O(n) for light cone checks

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Minkowski norms F(x,v) generalizing Riemannian metrics
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus with direction-dependent distances, Byzantine nodes violate norm properties
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating Finsler norm axioms (homogeneity, triangle inequality) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^2) for Finsler distances, O(n) for norm validation

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Nilpotent Lie group with bracket [X,Y] = Z
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in non-commutative phase space, Byzantine nodes violate group law
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating Heisenberg commutation relations are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^2) for group operations, O(n) for center validation

cat_k_space_bft.name: CAT(k) Space BFT
cat_k_space_bft.description: Consensus in spaces with curvature bounded above by k.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Spaces with curvature bounded above by k
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in spaces with bounded curvature, Byzantine nodes violate CAT inequalities
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating triangle comparison properties are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^2) for curvature bounds, O(n) for comparison validation

ultralimit_bft.name: Ultralimit BFT
ultralimit_bft.description: Consensus in asymptotic cones via ultralimits.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Asymptotic cones via ultralimits of metric spaces
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in asymptotic cones, Byzantine nodes violate scaling limits
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes preventing ultralimit convergence are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^2) for scaling analysis, O(n) for ultralimit validation

event_horizon_bft.name: Event Horizon BFT
event_horizon_bft.description: Byzantine nodes get 'trapped' behind event horizons.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Black hole event horizons as causal boundaries
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Byzantine nodes get 'trapped' behind event horizons, consensus emerges from asymptotic regions
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes exhibiting 'gravitational collapse' behavior are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^3) for horizon detection, O(n^2) for asymptotic analysis

symmetric_space_bft.name: Symmetric Space BFT
symmetric_space_bft.description: Consensus via Cartan decomposition for symmetric spaces.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: G = KAN decomposition for symmetric spaces G/K
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus in the A (abelian) component, Byzantine detection via K-component anomalies
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes violating Cartan decomposition are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^3) for Lie group operations, O(n^2) for symmetric space geometry

carnot_caratheodory_bft.name: Carnot-Carathéodory BFT
carnot_caratheodory_bft.description: Consensus along admissible directions in bracket-generating distributions.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Distance via horizontal curves in bracket-generating distributions
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus along admissible directions, Byzantine nodes violate non-holonomic constraints
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes proposing 'unreachable' states (violating distribution constraints) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^3) for sub-Riemannian distance, O(n^2) for distribution validation

yamabe_problem_bft.name: Yamabe Problem BFT
yamabe_problem_bft.description: Consensus via conformal deformation to uniform scalar curvature.

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Existence of constant scalar curvature in conformal class
blueprint.bft_mechanism: Consensus via conformal deformation to uniform scalar curvature
blueprint.fault_detection: Nodes preventing Yamabe solution (constant curvature) are Byzantine
blueprint.complexity_details: O(n^3) for Yamabe equation, O(n^2) for scalar curvature
